unnormalised: Saw Mr. Sharma, the CFO, at the chai stall near the office. He looked stressed, probably 'cause the Q3 reports are due on 30/09/2024. Heard from Mrs. Verma, the HR Manager, that the CEO, Mr. Kapoor, wants a complete overhaul of the employee benefits. Even met Adv. Patil, our legal head, who was rushing to the Bombay High Court for a hearing. Everyone seems super busy, especially with the AGM coming up next month on 15/10/2024.
normalised: Saw Mister Sharma, the C-F-O, at the chai stall near the office. He looked stressed, probably because the Q three reports are due on thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four. Heard from Missus Verma, the H-R Manager, that the C-E-O, Mister Kapoor, wants a complete overhaul of the employee benefits. Even met Advocate Patil, our legal head, who was rushing to the Bombay High Court for a hearing. Everyone seems super busy, especially with the A-G-M coming up next month on fifteenth october two thousand and twenty four.
